EmailTemplate.subject: GA11-024 - Manual Updating DR VNM Server
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You're receiving this newsletter because of your relationship with TriTech Software Systems.
POSTED 11.11.11
GA11-024 - Manual Updating DR VNM Server
Dear Clients,
The Technical Advisory - GA11-024 - Manual Updating DR VNM Server has been posted to the MyVisiNet support site. Manual updates need to be performed on the DR VisiNet Mobile Server to keep it current with Production VisiNet Mobile Server. Please read the Advisory for full details.
You may access this advisory via the MyVisiNet Support site under Documentation | Tech Advisories | VisiNet Advisories | 2011.
Sincerely,
Tony Vardiman Technical Services Frontline Supervisor | VisiNet Solutions TriTech Software Systems | tritech.com Direct: 858.799.7441 | Mobile: 619.816.7100 Fax: 858.799.7010 | Support: 800.847.4223 Support Website: myvisinet.tritech.com Read Full Article | Email Feedback
This email was sent by TriTech Software Systems 9860 Mesa Rim Road | San Diego | CA | 92121
